valid_grants.description: Studying emergence across scales from quantum to cosmic. Research focuses on complex systems and emergent properties in natural phenomena.
valid_grants.notes: Perfect match for Sacred Societies' focus on emergent complexity and systems consciousness.

valid_grants.description: Supporting projects that ensure AI systems are transparent, accountable, and aligned with human values and consciousness
valid_grants.notes: Good alignment with consciousness-AI intersection and ethical AI development.

invalid_grants.description: This is a made-up grant opportunity that doesn't actually exist
invalid_grants.notes: This foundation and grant do not exist.

sample_questions.question_text: Describe your project in 1-2 sentences (max 280 characters)

Research Grant Program

We are pleased to announce our annual research grant program supporting innovative projects in science and technology.

Application Deadline: December 15, 2025
Award Amount: $50,000 - $200,000
